response.overview: Everyone has to start somewhere in porn, and for most girls it happens in their late teens when the combined craving of money and cock takes over their lives. To some it's a travesty of lost innocence; but we've a sneaking suspicion you won't care for a second, especially once the likes of Lexy and Marie get out of their clothes and begin to enjoy dick after dick with the kind of gusto that could put some of their older performers to shame. No question about it, these crazed whores don't hold back for a moment as they unzip the knobs on offer; and before you know it they're getting pounded in all their holes in return for the next rent-cheque. All of which soon results in a sticky blast of pent-up goo all over their pretty faces!
